message: The STAT_CONC_DEF field for indicator 15-1-1, translated into en
data:
To provide an accurate definition of the indicator, it is crucial to provide a definition of "Forest" and "Total land area".

According to FAO definitions, Floresta is defined as: “land covering more than 0.5 hectares with trees over 5 meters and a canopy cover of more than 10%, or trees capable of reaching these thresholds in situ . It does not include land predominantly under agricultural or urban use ”.
